data.text: @DylanDreyerNBC @TODAYshow @hodakotb @SavannahGuthrie Dylan Dreyer NBC Today Show What Cute Picture Of The Whole Gang W Your Kids Love Big Bird Kids Are So Cute
@DylanDreyerNBC @TODAYshow @hodakotb @SavannahGuthrie It was the best thing ever to see on a morning with such heartbreaking news out of California. These children made my heart happy!
@DylanDreyerNBC @TODAYshow @hodakotb @SavannahGuthrie Love, love, love this!
@DylanDreyerNBC @TODAYshow @hodakotb @SavannahGuthrie Every child love Sesame Street

@DylanDreyerNBC @TODAYshow @hodakotb @SavannahGuthrie Those kids are adorable

@DylanDreyerNBC @TODAYshow @hodakotb @SavannahGuthrie This made my week! Cal’s hugs for the characters were simply the best!!!

@DylanDreyerNBC @TODAYshow @hodakotb @SavannahGuthrie This just made my day. What a wonderful experience for all of your kids.  I think I'm pretty jealous over here. I would have loved to meet Cookie Monster back in my day.

@DylanDreyerNBC @sesamestreet @TODAYshow @hodakotb @SavannahGuthrie this was so special. i cried! Go @sesamestreet The public needs to make sure @sesamestreet never quits!
@DylanDreyerNBC @TODAYshow @hodakotb @SavannahGuthrie That is every child’s hope and reality. And it’s important for him to carry that belief for a very long time. Big Bird knows his name!

@DylanDreyerNBC @TODAYshow @hodakotb @SavannahGuthrie Your son, Calvin, has the sweetest personality. It was such a joy to see him laughing with Big Bird!
@DylanDreyerNBC @TODAYshow @hodakotb @SavannahGuthrie Being on “the Street” has been one of my favorite life experiences.  It’s so magical-words can’t describe it!
@DylanDreyerNBC @TODAYshow @hodakotb @SavannahGuthrie All of the TodayShow kids are adorable, but Calvin’s smile is too cute!!!
